name: Dr. Peggy Gleason
what_you_do: Dr. Peggy Gleason is a Duke trained Certified Integrative Health Coach with multiple coaching certifications as a Life and Wellness Coach and holds a Doctoral Degree in Natural Health. She has been a nurse for over 4 decades and specialized in Critical Care Nursing for 30 years.
who_you_serve: Her passion is to guide professional women towards better health and wellness through exploring all dimensions of their lives with focus on balance in all areas.
social_proof: She has inspired women from all over the globe to continue their success as professional women while finding time for living a life of more contentment, better health, and more peace of mind.
business_focus: Guiding professional women towards better health and wellness through exploring all dimensions of their lives with a focus on balance.
service_provided: Integrative health coaching, life and wellness coaching, natural health expertise
